item.text: Now all the tax collectors and sinners were coming to hear him.
But the Pharisees and the experts in the law were complaining, “This man welcomes sinners and eats with them.”
So Jesus told them this parable:

“<st data-num="5101">Which</st> <st data-num="444">one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, if he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> a <st data-num="1540" class="">hundred</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2641" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="1768">ninety</st>-<st data-num="1767">nine</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048">open pasture</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4198">go</st> look <st data-num="1909">for</st><n id="4" /> the one that is <st data-num="622" class="">lost</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>?<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> when he has <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> it, he <st data-num="2007" class="">places</st> it <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5606" class="">shoulders</st>, <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoicing</st>.

<st data-num="2064" class="">Returning</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>, he <st data-num="4779">calls together</st><n id="2" /> his<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1069" class="">neighbors</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, ‘<st data-num="4796">Rejoice with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> that was <st data-num="622" class="">lost.’</st>
I tell you, in the same way there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine righteous people who have no need to repent.
“Or what woman, if she has ten silver coins and loses one of them, does not light a lamp, sweep the house, and search thoroughly until she finds it?

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> when she has <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> it, she <st data-num="4779">calls together</st> her<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1069" class="">neighbors</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="4796">Rejoice<n id="3" /> with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="1406" class="">coin</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I had <st data-num="622" class="">lost.’</st>
In the same way, I tell you, there is joy in the presence of God’s angels over one sinner who repents.”
Then Jesus said, “A man had two sons.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3501" class="">younger</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>, ‘<st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="3313" class="">share</st> of the <st data-num="3776" class="">estate</st><n id="3" /> that will <st data-num="1911">belong<n id="4" /> to me</st>.’ <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="5" /> he <st data-num="1244" class="">divided</st> his<n id="6" /> <st data-num="979">assets</st> between <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3756 4183">few</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3501" class="">younger</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered together</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> he had and <st data-num="589" class="">left on a journey</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="3117" class="">distant</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">country</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> he <st data-num="1287" class="">squandered</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3776" class="">wealth</st><n id="4" /> with a <st data-num="811">wild</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">lifestyle</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> after <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="1159" class="">spent</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>, a <st data-num="2478" class="">severe</st> <st data-num="3042" class="">famine</st> <st data-num="1096">took place</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">country</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to be <st data-num="5302" class="">in need</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="2853">worked for</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="4177" class="">citizens</st> of <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">country</st>, who<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="68" class="">fields</st> to <st data-num="1006" class="">feed</st> <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>.<n id="3" />

He<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1937" class="">longing</st> to <st data-num="5526" class="">eat</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2769" class="">carob pods</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st> were <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> anything.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">his senses</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="4214">How many</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">father’s</st> <st data-num="3407">hired workers</st> have <st data-num="740" class="">food</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4052" class="">enough to spare</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="622" class="">dying</st> from <st data-num="3042" class="">hunger</st>!

I will <st data-num="450">get up</st> and <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, I have <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519">against</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">against</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> to be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son;</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">treat</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3407">hired workers</st>.”’

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="450" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> while he <st data-num="568" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> a <st data-num="3112" class="">long way</st> from home<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="4697" class="">heart went out to</st> him;<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="5143" class="">ran</st> and <st data-num="1968" class="">hugged</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5137">son</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2705" class="">kissed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="3962">Father</st>, I have <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you;</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> to be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son.’</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="5036">Hurry</st>! <st data-num="1627" class="">Bring</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">best</st> <st data-num="4749" class="">robe</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1746" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="1746">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>! <st data-num="1325" class="">Put</st> a <st data-num="1146" class="">ring</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">finger</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="4228">feet</st>!

<st data-num="5342" class="">Bring</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4618" class="">fattened</st> <st data-num="3448" class="">calf</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="2380" class="">kill</st> it! Let us <st data-num="2068">eat</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="2165" class="">celebrate</st>,
because this son of mine was dead, and is alive again—he was lost and is found!’ So they began to celebrate.
“Now his older son was in the field. As he came and approached the house, he heard music and dancing.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="3816" class="">slaves</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="4441" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1510">was happening</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">The</st> slave <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> has <st data-num="2240" class="">returned</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> has <st data-num="2380" class="">killed</st> the <st data-num="4618" class="">fattened</st> <st data-num="3448" class="">calf</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="618" class="">got</st> his <st data-num="846" class="">son</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="618" class="">back</st> <st data-num="5198">safe and sound</st>.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the older son<n id="1" /> became <st data-num="3710" class="">angry</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756 2309">refused</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1525">go in</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> and <st data-num="3870" class="">appealed</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! <st data-num="5118">These many</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> I have <st data-num="1398">worked like a slave</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1325" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="3763" class="">never</st> <st data-num="3928" class="">disobeyed</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commands</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="3" /> you <st data-num="3763" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> even a <st data-num="2056" class="">goat</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I could <st data-num="2165" class="">celebrate</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st>!

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064">came back</st>, who has <st data-num="2719" class="">devoured</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="979" class="">assets</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitutes</st>,<n id="3" /> you <st data-num="2380" class="">killed</st> the <st data-num="4618" class="">fattened</st> <st data-num="3448" class="">calf</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">him!’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the father<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="5043">Son</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that <st data-num="1699">belongs to me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">yours</st>.
It was appropriate to celebrate and be glad, for your brother was dead, and is alive; he was lost and is found.’”
